alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 21 at 8:32PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT FOR THE YUKON RIVER AT STEVENS VILLAGE IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Yukon River near Stevens Village. * WHEN...Until 830 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding is occurring in Stevens Village due to snowmelt in the Yukon and Porcupine basins. There is a foot of water over the airport access road. Expect river levels to continue a slow rise and crest over the next day or two. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 827 PM AKDT, Rapid snowmelt will cause flooding. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly, especially near Yukon River at Stevens Village. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
